description:
This course will examine the stages involved in acquiring motor skills to attain expert sporting performance at an elite level. Students will be introduced to movement analysis software and specific coach intervention strategies that can be used to improve skill learning. Students will also be introduced to performance analysis software and specific coach intervention strategies that can be used to improve team performance. Quantitative analysis will assist students to develop their observational skills to enhance athletic performance.

This course is available to Study Abroad/Exchange students.
